title: Repair Pixel XL without losing my data
content:
Hi,

I live in France and i have a Google Pixel XL (bought in UK) that stopped charging. I would like to get it repaired but through the "repair" process i am forced to confirm that i agree to delete the content of the phone.

The reason why i want to repair it is actually reovering some content that was not properly back-up.

I need to understand if Google can fix my phone without erasing and how to do that.

As a long-time google user, I am a bit disappointed by the fact that is totally impossible to get in touch with the assistance.

Thanks for your help
